TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and resides in the city of GPE , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE , as a result of injuries sustained in an industrial accident , the applicant was unable to work . Thereafter , he was paid a disability pension by his former employer , the PERSON i ORG company . According to the applicant , PERCENT of the shares in the company belong to the ORG .
In DATE the payments ceased and on DATE the applicant lodged a claim with the Moskovsky ORG of GPE against the company .

On DATE ORG found in favour of the applicant ( ORG Харкова ) . The decision became effective on DATE and was sent for execution to the Moskovsky ORG of ORG ( ORG Районного Управлiння Юстицiї м Харкова ) .
On DATE , ORG initiated execution proceedings in the applicant ’s case . The first payment ( CARDINAL ORG ) to the applicant was made on DATE .

In the absence of further execution , the applicant contacted the bailiff responsible for the execution of the judgment on several occasions and , on DATE , lodged a complaint with the Head of the Moskovsky ORG of ORG against that bailiff .

On DATE the Head of the Moskovsky ORG of ORG replied to the applicant , stating , inter alia , that the judgment could not be executed due to the adoption of GPE on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property ” ( ORG Про введення мораторiю на примусову реалiзацiю TIME ” ) , which had entered into force on DATE .
On DATE , a second payment ( CARDINAL UAH ) was made to the applicant .
On DATE , the final payment ( CARDINAL ORG ) was made to the applicant and the court judgment of CARDINAL DATE was thereby fully enforced .
CARDINAL . Civil Code of GPE

Under LAW , in case of delay in the fulfilment of its financial obligations , the debtor must , upon a claim of the creditor , pay the amount of the debt , plus any interest payable at an established inflation rate during the default period .
CARDINAL . PERSON of GPE of CARDINAL DATE “ on the LAW of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property ”
The PERSON aims at protecting ORG interests on the sale of assets belonging to undertakings in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital .
The moratorium has been introduced until such time as the mechanism for the forced sale of the property of such undertakings has been improved . No time - limit has been set .
Section CARDINAL of the PERSON provides that the forced sale of property includes the execution of writs by ORG over property belonging to undertakings .

The PERSON applies to immovable property and other fixed assets , which are used in production , as well as shares , owned by the ORG in the property of other companies and invested to the statutory capital of those enterprises .
The PERSON therefore stays the execution of all writs by ORG over the above - mentioned assets or undertakings in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital .
CARDINAL . PERSON of GPE of DATE “ on Enforcement Proceedings ”

Under LAW , the enforcement of judgments is entrusted to ORG . Under LAW of the PERSON the creditor may file a complaint against actions or omissions of ORG with the head of the competent department of that ORG or with a local court . Article CARDINAL of the PERSON entitles the creditor to institute court proceedings against ORG for inadequate enforcement or non - enforcement of a judgment , and to receive compensation .
CARDINAL . PERSON of GPE of DATE “ on ORG ”

LAW provides for the liability of bailiffs for any inadequate performance of their duties , and compensation for damages caused by a bailiff when enforcing a judgment . Under LAW , acts and omissions of the bailiff can be challenged before a superior official or the courts .
